title: Loading indicator
description: Displays during indeterminate loading states when wait time is unknown

frontMatter.title: Loading indicator
frontMatter.description: Displays during indeterminate loading states when wait time is unknown

when_to_use.value: When the wait time for a process, such as loading a page, is unknown
When fetching data or content asynchronously

when_to_consider_else.value: For file uploads with known progress: use the Standard progress bar
For form steps: use the [Progress bar - Segmented](/docs/components/form/progress-bar-segmented) instead
When you can show skeleton loading states instead

accessibility.value: Uses WAI-ARIA attributes (`aria-live="polite"`, `aria-label`, `aria-valuetext`) to notify screen reader users of loading status
The `label` prop provides an accessible name for screen readers
Use `set-focus` when the loading indicator appears after a user action to move focus appropriately
Ensure loading states don't trap keyboard focus

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- Default loading indicator -->
<va-loading-indicator label="Loading"></va-loading-indicator>

<!-- With visible message -->
<va-loading-indicator
  label="Loading your application"
  message="Loading your application..."
></va-loading-indicator>

<!-- With focus capture -->
<va-loading-indicator
  label="Saving your draft"
  message="Saving your draft..."
  set-focus
></va-loading-indicator>
